response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to both of us. I understand its importance and the potential it has to enrich your endeavors or personal life. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to its market value of $1,200,000, allowing you to benefit from an exceptional deal.

I am confident that this product will exceed your expectations and bring you immense satisfaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
